info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hudspeth County through 315 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Sierra Blanca, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Indian Hot Springs, Frenchman Canyon and Big Box. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 109 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
